basic_information.scholarship_name: LGBTQIA+ Faculty Staff Association Scholarship and Support Fund

description: To provide scholarships for students attending UCO who meet the following criteria: Eligibility Requirements Must identify within LGBTQIA+ community Must have a minimum of 3.0 GPA Can be undergraduate or graduate student Must provide a personal statement of 1-2 pages explaining their background and career goals This scholarship is available to apply for during the Current UCO Student Application.

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

criteria.description: SIS_Level is Undergraduate   or SIS_Level is Graduate
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Level is Undergraduate   or SIS_Level is Graduate
